content:
"The Last Dance" is an excellent documentary series. If you're looking for more sports documentaries with a similar vibe, here are some recommendations:

1. **"O.J.: Made in America" (ESPN 30 for 30)**: A five-part series that explores the life and career of O.J. Simpson, both on and off the field. It's a fascinating and thought-provoking documentary that goes beyond just sports.
2. **"When the Game Changes You" (Apple TV+)**: A four-part series that tells the story of the 2019 Toronto Raptors' NBA championship season. It's an intimate and behind-the-scenes look at the team's journey, featuring exclusive access and interviews.
3. **"The Two Escobars" (ESPN 30 for 30)**: A documentary that explores the connection between crime and soccer in Colombia during the 1980s and 1990s. It's a gripping and well-researched film that delves into the darker side of sports.
4. **"The Undefeated" (Netflix)**: A documentary series that explores the intersection of sports, culture, and race. Each episode focuses on a different topic, from the impact of Colin Kaepernick's national anthem protests to the history of the African American tennis player Arthur Ashe.
5. **"The Birth of Big Air" (ESPN 30 for 30)**: A documentary that tells the story of the X Games and the evolution of action sports. It's an exciting and inspiring film that features interviews with legends like Tony Hawk and Travis Pastrana.
6. **"The Fab Five" (ESPN 30 for 30)**: A documentary that explores the University of Michigan's basketball team in the early 1990s, featuring five talented freshmen who changed the game. It's a fun and nostalgic film that looks at the impact of their style and swagger on the sport.
7. **"Slaying the Badger" (ESPN 30 for 30)**: A documentary that tells the story of the 1986 Tour de France, focusing on the rivalry between Greg LeMond and Bernard Hinault. It's a tense and suspenseful film that's perfect for cycling fans.

These documentaries offer a mix of sports, culture, and storytelling that's similar to "The Last Dance." I hope you find something that interests you!
